A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie made some risky decisions that I am still trying to understand. Why does Princess Leah fly through space? Why is Rose a character? Who do we care about in this film as far as a protagonist? We again see the classics reskined with the hermit Jedi master on a remote planet\, the snow/salt trench warfare versus enhanced AT-AT walkers\, and the revealing of parenthood. The graphics\, scenery\, and warfare was brilliant\, but that's it...
